about.details:
Incorporated in 1999, Daps Advertising Limited is engaged in the business of providing advertising agency services. The company offers a range of advertising media services consisting of print media, electronic media and outdoor media services which cover advertisement modes such as newspapers, brochures, magazines, television channels, FM channels and display of outdoor hoardings etc.

The company's customers include corporate clients operating in various business fields viz. construction, education, electronics, automobiles, FMCG, jewellery, apparel, insurance, housing, hospital, financial service providers, aviation, Government organizations etc.

For the period ended September 30, 2022, and for the financial year ended March 31, 2022, 2021 and 2020, the company's revenue from operations was Rs 1458.33 lakhs, Rs 1868.31 lakhs, Rs 785.58 lakhs and Rs 2022.70 lakhs, respectively.

Competitive Strength:

  • Accreditation with Indian Newspaper Society (INS).
  • Experience of our Promoters and senior management team.
  • Customer Satisfaction.
  • Repeat Customers.

faqs.question: What is the DAPS Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer:
DAPS Advertising IPO is a SME IPO of 1700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.10 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on October 31, 2022, and closes on November 3, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in DAPS Advertising IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in DAPS Advertising IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in DAPS Advertising IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in DAPS Advertising IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'DAPS Advertising IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When DAPS Advertising IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The DAPS Advertising IPO opens on October 31, 2022 and closes on November 3, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of DAPS Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer: DAPS Advertising IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for DAPS Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in DAPS Advertising IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is DAPS Advertising IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for DAPS Advertising IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 9, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, November 11, 2022. Check the DAPS Advertising IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is DAPS Advertising IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The DAPS Advertising IPO listing date is on Monday, November 14, 2022.
